body_content.explanation: to not now have an unwanted or unpleasant task, object, or person:
examples: I didn't enjoy marking those papers and I was glad to be rid of them.

body_content.explanation: to remove or throw away something unwanted:
examples: That cream got rid of my skin rash.
I used weedkiller to get rid of the weeds in the garden.

body_content.explanation: to sell an old or unwanted possession:
examples: Have you managed to get rid of your old Volvo yet?

body_content.explanation: to send away someone annoying or to persuade them to leave:
examples: We got rid of our unwelcome guests by saying we had to go to bed.
